name: Solar System- Inside the Astroid Belt
name_original: Solar System- Inside the Astroid Belt
description:
It's a common informative game about our Solar System.

Currently there are only included 4 planets (the ones inside the astroid belt) and their respective moons. They are:

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Earth
    1. Moon
  4. Mars
    1. Phobos
    2. Deimos

Created By: Rishi Lakhani
